this-is-a-test.title: This is a test
this-is-a-test.summary: The point of marked was to create a markdown compiler where it was possible to frequently parse huge chunks of markdown without having to worry about caching the compiled output somehow...or blocking for an unnecesarily long time.

line-height.summary: Stuff about line height and sub pixel rendering

user-testing-popcorn.title: User testing Popcorn Maker
user-testing-popcorn.summary: Last weekend the Popcorn team conducted a user testing session at the Toronto office to uncover problem areas in our interface and gage user reactions. We learned a lot.

testing-figures.title: Login styles
testing-figures.summary: This week I took a look at different login systems and the language ( verbal and visual ) they use to entice users to sign up.
